content:
The character is a swift moving bringer of death, a living,
bloody scythe before whom foes die like corn before the
reaper. The character may use Swift Attack and Lighting
Attack as a Half Action rather than a Full Action. In addition,
the character may use the Swift Attack and Lightning Attack
Talents during a Charge.
